200.description: we have 6 pair of authentications, which one of them can be current system authentication type
Check if user is logged in and getting user login info

post.description:
In this route base on type of authentication (you can get from route => '/api/auth/type') some fields are required like password in 'usernamePassword' type. 

 'OTP' => If you are in OTP mode and send just mobile then if OTP type is sms you get verification code and if is google2fa user already has the code in google authenticator app, and in the next step you should send mobile with code to get token (if user is not registered by sending it's mobile number will be and then get the code) 

 'usernamePassword' => In this mode you must sent mobile and password for registering and login, also if user activate 2step authentication base on system otp set by admin will be prompted for code before getting token

 'otpOrPassword => In this mode if user has set password can send mobile and password otherwise he/she can click on send otp code

otpForce.description: required in case type of system is otpOrPassword and user wants to login with otp

200.description: each response is differnt based on authentication type and fields you send to server

otp / google2fa [mobile] => when user is.message: There is no need for sending verification in google 2FA authentication.

otpOrPassword / google2fa [mobile] => wh.message: There is no need for sending verification in google 2FA authentication.

401.description: if user send incorrect code or password

usernamePassword / sms or google2fa [mob.message: Email & Password does not match with our record.

otpOrPassword / sms or google2fa [mobile.message: Email & Password does not match with our record.

example.message: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits. (and 2 more errors)

mobile: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits.
password: The password field is required when code is not present.
code: The code field is required when password is not present.

500.description: in case of some server problems for example broken saving or ...

post.description:
you can use this route for setting password
* you should be aware that we don't have password setting in otp mode and usernameAndPassword

200.description: each response is different based on authentication type and fields you send to server

post.description:
you can use this route for setting and resetting password
* you should be aware that we don't have password setting and resetting in otp mode

200.description: each response is differnt based on authentication type and fields you send to server

otp / google2fa [mobile] => when user is.message: There is no need for sending verification in google 2FA authentication.

OTP / sms or google2fa [mobile, code].message: No need for password reset in this mode.

otpOrPassword / google2fa [mobile] => wh.message: There is no need for sending verification in google 2FA authentication.

401.description: if user send incorrect code or password

usernamePassword / sms or google2fa [mob.message: Email & Password does not match with our record.

otpOrPassword / sms or google2fa [mobile.message: Email & Password does not match with our record.

example.message: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits. (and 1 more error)

mobile: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits.
password: The password field is required when code is present.

500.description: in case of some server problems for example broken saving or ...

post.description:
you can use this route for reiniting google2fa
* you should be aware that we don't have google2fa reiniting in otp=sms mode

200.description: each response is differnt based on authentication type and fields you send to server

otp / sms [mobile] => when otp mode is s.message: No need for re init google2fa in this mode

example.message: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits. (and 1 more error)

mobile: The mobile must be between 12 and 12 digits.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of tags, or a specific tag if the `id` query parameter is provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tag to retrieve

404.description: Not Found - Tag with given ID not found

post.description: Allows users with tag.create permission to create or find a tag.

403.description: If user is not allowed to create tags

delete.description: Deletes a tag if it is not currently in use.

403.description: If user is not allowed to delete tags

delete.description: Forcefully deletes the tag and detaches it from all models.

403.description: If user is not allowed to delete tags
